Public Class cProtect Public Sub ProtectProcess(bProtect As Boolean) Dim hProc As IntPtr = GetCurrentProcess() Dim bResult As Boolean = GetPrivilegs(SE_DEBUG_NAME) Dim ProcessInfo As IntPtr = IntPtr.Zero

NtSetInformationProcess(hProc, iBreakTermination, New IntPtr(VarPtr(ProcessInfo)), Marshal.SizeOf(ProcessInfo)) End Sub
